newsitem.title: USA: AMR sets Memorial Day holiday sale.
newsitem.headline: AMR sets Memorial Day holiday sale.

text.p: AMR Corp's American Airlines and its regional affiliate, American Eagle, said they are offering special, one-day advance purchase fares for the Memorial Day holiday weekend.
The non-refundable fares range from $88 to $298 round-trip. The special fares are available in the 48 contiguous states and Canada.
Travel must be begin after the noon hour on Saturday, May 24. Return travel may occur that Saturday evening or anytime on Sunday, May 25.
